snippet: The chairwoman of the Los Angeles Sparks, Paula Madison, has told the W.N.B.A. that the league should look for new owners of the club.
abstract: Paula Madison, chairwoman of the Los Angeles Sparks, alerts WNBA that league should look for new owners of the club, citing extensive financial losses.
lead_paragraph: The chairwoman of the Los Angeles Sparks, Paula Madison, has told the W.N.B.A. that the league should look for new owners of the club.
